title: Amazon | FEE2 | Hyderabad
content:
```
Education: B.Tech in CS
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: SDE at Product based company
Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Frontend Engineer 2
Location: Hyderabad, India
Salary: ₹42,00,000
Relocation: ₹150,000
Signing Bonus: ₹13,50,000 for 1st year, ₹11,00,000 for second year
Stock bonus: 200 units vested over 5% - 10% - 20% interval 
Total comp (Salary + Stock): ₹ 57,44,195 for first year
```

Interview Experience => https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6193179/Amazon-or-FEE2-or-Hyderabad-or-Offer

title: Amazon | System Development Engineer I (L4) | Hyderabad
content:
* **Education**: B.Tech in Computer Science from Tier 1 College (2024 Graduate)
* **Years of Experience** : 0.5 Yrs
* **Prior Experience**: SDE-1 at Zolo
* **Date of Offer**: Jan 2025
* **Company**: Amazon
* **Role**: System Development Engineer 1 L4
* **Location**: Hyderabad 
* **Base**: 20L
* **Joining Bonus**: 4.5L on First Year, 3.5L on Second Year
* **Stocks**: 12.5L of RSU vested for 4 Yrs (5%, 15%, 40%, 40%)
* **Relocation Bonus**: 1.5L
* **Total Compensation**: 42L
* **Benefits**: Standard Amazon Benefits.

title: Tekion offer | SDE | Banglore
content:
### Offer Details and Query  

- **Education:** Tier 3  
- **Experience:** 3.5+ years  
- **Previous Role:** Product-based MNC  
- **Offer Date:** 25th Dec 2024  
- **Company:** Tekion Corp  
- **Role/Title:** Software Development Engineer (SDE)  
- **Location:** Bangalore (Hybrid, 2 days in-office)  
- **Compensation:**
  - **Base Salary:** ₹25 LPA (Includes PF: ₹75k)  
  - **Relocation/Signing Bonus:** ₹1 LPA  
  - **Stock Bonus:** ₹20,26,216 (~₹5.06 LPA annually over 4 years, 4,000 units)  
  - **Bonus:** NA  
  - **Total Compensation (TC):** ₹25 LPA + ₹1 LPA + ₹5.06 LPA = **~₹32 LPA**  
- **Benefits:** Standard Tekion Corp benefits  

---

### Should I Negotiate?
salaryTotal: (tc): Rs25 Lpa + Rs1 Lpa + Rs5.06 Lpa = ~rs32 Lpa
